metadata.title: CVE-2018-18248 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga Web 2 has XSS via the /icingaweb2/monitoring/list/services dirparameter, the /icingaweb2/user/list query string, the/icingaweb2/monitoring/timeline query string, or the /icingaweb2/setupquery string.

criterions.comment: icingaweb2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
